spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The storm sorcerer is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Heart of the Storm
entries: Whenever the storm sorcerer casts a spell other than a cantrip that deals lightning or thunder damage, a stormy aura surrounds it. In addition to the spell's effects, creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it take 5 lightning or thunder damage (storm sorcerer' choice).

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The storm sorcerer has 11 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

items.name: Heightened Spell:
items.entry: When the storm sorcerer casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, it can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.

items.name: Quickened Spell:
items.entry: When the storm sorcerer casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, it can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The storm priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) thunder damage.

reaction.name: Wrath of the Storm (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the storm priest hits the storm priest with an attack, and the storm priest can see the creature, the storm priest can magically force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning or thunder damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The skirmisher can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: The skirmisher gains advantage on its first attack roll this turn if it has moved at least 15 feet from its space at the beginning of its turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The skirmisher deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the skirmisher that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the skirmisher doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skald makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy the skirmisher can see ends its turn within 5 feet of it, the skirmisher can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Shadow Wings
entries: Toulon can unfurl its wings and create an aura of darkness within a 30-foot radius, negating normal and magical light of 3rd level or lower. Toulon can create or dismiss this darkness as an action.

trait.name: Heart Devourer
entries: When Toulon hits a creature with an attack, the target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 4d12 + 5 piercing damage and 4d10 + 4 psychic damage. If the target dies, Toulon devours its heart, gaining 50 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Dark Aura
entries: All creatures within 30 feet of Toulon have a -2 penalty to saving throws and attack rolls while within the Dark Aura.

trait.name: Bladestorm Assault
entries: Toulon transforms into an Avatar of Serrated Annihilation. It releases a swirling vortex of razor-sharp blades in a 60-foot cone. Creatures caught in the cone must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take 10d10 slashing damage and suffer a bleeding wound. At the start of each of their turns, creatures affected by the bleeding wound take an additional 1d6 slashing damage. The bleeding effect persists until they receive magical healing or succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw to staunch the bleeding. The affected creatures are also blinded for 1 minute. They can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the blindness on a success.
Usage 1/Day

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Toulon makes three attacks: one with its antler and two with its claws.

action.name: Antler
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d10 + 5 piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 slashing damage.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The shadow wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Chilling Touch
entries: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4d6 + 4 cold damage.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow wraith can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadowy Tendrils
entries: The shadow beast can extend its shadowy tendrils up to 10 feet and make a grapple attack as a bonus action. On a hit, the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappled, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage at the start of its turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.name: Frostwing

specialTraits.name: Aerial Domination
entries: Advantage on saving throws against effects that would knock Frostwing prone. Can hover and make sharp turns without penalty.

specialTraits.name: Scale Shield
entries: Resistance to cold damage and non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

monster.languages: Understands Common and Draconic, but cannot speak

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Frostwing makes three attacks: one with its Bite and two with its Talons.

actions.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

actions.name: Frost Breath
entries: Frostwing exhales a cone of freezing breath in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw are restrained until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Arctic Dive
entries: Frostwing dives towards a ship or airborne target, attempting to slam into it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 55 (10d10) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the target takes half the damage and is not knocked prone.

actions.name: Winter's Embrace
entries: Frostwing envelops itself in a frigid aura, causing the surrounding air to freeze. All creatures within a 30-foot radius of Frostwing must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 55 (10d10) cold damage and become restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendaryActions.desc: Frostwing can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Frostwing regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
entries: Frostwing targets a creature within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Glacial Assault
entries: Frostwing makes a Bite or Talons attack.

actions.name: Frost Nova
entries: Frostwing releases a powerful burst of cold energy, creating a freezing explosion in a 20-foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the saving throw have their speed reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.
